activity_differential: woman preparing child for the day
woman prompting child to get up
description: A woman in a floral dress interacts with a boy on a bed in a modest living room. The boy appears to be getting ready or being prompted to get up, and the woman later uses a comb, possibly preparing herself or the boy. The scene transitions from interaction to the woman focusing on grooming.
